extensionDescription.message: You can paste any image on a web page. Supports moving, scaling, rotating, duplication, and deletion. No upload will occur.

defaultPopupTextNoError.message:
Drop images here
or
Click to select images
defaultPopupTextNoError.description: Information text in default_popup when no error

defaultPopupTextError.message:
An error has occurred
Try again
defaultPopupTextError.description: Information text in default_popup when neither updating extension nor reopening default_popup is required

defaultPopupTextUpdatingError.message:
An error has occurred
Try updating extension
defaultPopupTextUpdatingError.description: Information text in default_popup when updating extension is required

defaultPopupTextReopeningError.message:
An error has occurred
Try reopening popup
defaultPopupTextReopeningError.description: Information text in default_popup when reopening default_popup is required
